home.title: Monitorea todos tus cultivos en un solo lugar
home.subtitle: AgroMaster: Tu asistente agrícola todo en uno. Desde monitoreo en tiempo real hasta análisis avanzados, asegura cultivos más saludables y maximiza rendimientos.

our_solution.title: About AgroMaster
our_solution.subtitle: Our app provides a complete and efficient automation of the agricultural cycle, allowing users to obtain valuable insights about their crops through a single application. You can monitor and manage every aspect of your farm from anywhere, improving productivity and sustainability.

cards.title: Comprehensive Monitoring
cards.description: Keep an eye on all aspects of your crops' health and growth with real-time data and insights.

cards.title: Cost Efficiency
cards.description: Reduce waste and optimize resource usage, saving you time and money.

cards.title: easy to use
cards.description: Our user-friendly interface makes it simple for farmers of all tech levels to navigate and utilize the app.

cards.title: Scalable Solutions
cards.description: Whether you're managing a small farm or a large agricultural enterprise, AgroMaster scales with your needs.

features.title: Powerful features
features.subtitle: Here are some of the main features of our system:

panels.title: Automation
panels.description: Efficiently manage agricultural processes with automated workflows.

panels.title: Pre-made Reports
panels.description: Access comprehensive reports, including pest and disease analysis.

panels.title: Plant Data Analysis
panels.description: Analyze plant data to make informed decisions and optimize crop health.

panels.title: Intuitive Interface
panels.description: Navigate seamlessly through our user-friendly mobile application.

our_team.title: Who Are We?
our_team.subtitle: We are a team with extensive experience in developing technological solutions for the agricultural sector, and we are excited to present an innovative product.

years.title: +4 years
years.description: Of experience in agricultural systems development

projects.title: +80 projects
projects.description: Executed related to the collection, analysis and presentation of agricultural data

contact_us.title: Contact Us
contact_us.subtitle: Join us in transforming the future of agriculture in a sustainable and efficient way Got questions or ready to get started? Reach out to us today!
